# harness_platform_secret_sshkey (Data Source)

Resource for looking up an SSH Key type secret.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_secret_sshkey" "example" {
  identifier = "identifier"
}
```

- `port` (Number) SSH port
